pr_title: Fix LongEnum deserialization in map keys

timeline.message: Fix LongEnum deserialization in map keys

timeline.bodyText: Why would the value be string is the enum is long?
timeline.author: rongrong

replies.bodyText: that happens because of JSON serialization – in JSON, keys are always strings (this is why we have a similar check a few lines below – line 138).
replies.author: daniel-ohayon
